english.segment1: I walked with you. Just like we've done for so long. You seemed so near. But even that's become so common
english.segment2: It's not just you, just been together so long. That I thought I knew everything about you. But today I saw; did you open up my eyes?. 'Cause I feel like I've just seen you for the first time
english.segment3: Chorus. I didn't see you. But God I want to. You've come alive. and I think I've fallen harder than the first time
english.segment4: Was I so blind; how did I not see you?. Yet in all that time you never left my side. So for all my life, I will live to know you. So here I am; I'll take your hand
english.segment6: Bridge. I see your face; I feel you close. The love you've always shown me. Won't miss it now, can't waste a day. Jesus I'm yours completely
